Thank you for participating in the Columbia Keyword Privacy Study. 
 
 This app allows you to view and edit the list of keywords for which no location will be collected, to ensure your privacy. 
 
To edit your list, please visit the "Edit list", and add an item either by checking it in the menu or enter it into the text field. 

In this app, you can also view the current list of keywords you do not share, and your most recent location records. 

For more information please visit: http://keyword.cs.columbia.edu/ 

For immediate assistance, please email Chris at mani@cs.columbia.edu
